code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./ShowMyRestaurants.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowMyRestaurants=()=>{const[restaurants,setRestaurants]=useState([]);const token=localStorage.getItem('restaurantAccessToken');useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/restaurant-manager/approved-restaurants',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setRestaurants(data));},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"show-my-restaurants-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Approved Restaurants"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"my-restaurants-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Restaurant Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Preview"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:restaurants.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"4",children:"No approved restaurants yet."})}):restaurants.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:r.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:r.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`/restaurants/${r.id}`,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"preview-btn",children:"Preview"})})})]},r.id))})]})]});};export default ShowMyRestaurants;
